packages.name: Auto Shades
packages.description: Automatically control smartblinds and shades, by integrating with a light sensor.

packages.name: Combined Presence
packages.description: Combine two or more presence sensors to control an output Virtual Presence Sensor.

packages.name: Dimmer Minimums
packages.description: Enforce minimum dimming levels for smart dimmers that don't support it natively in their firmware.

packages.name: Reliable Locks
packages.description: Create virtual locks that wrap your physical lock devices, making them more reliable.  Especially useful for z-wave locks.

packages.name: Lockdown
packages.description: Reliably lock all the doors in your house when a specified switch is triggered.

packages.name: Switch Bindings
packages.description: Bind two or more switches/dimmers together to behave as one.

packages.name: Cooper Aspire RFWC5 Scene Controller Driver
packages.description: Driver for the Cooper Aspire RFWC5 Scene Controller.
